show.subtitle: Dr. Jack Rasmus will focus on today’s continuing crisis in the U.S. and global economies.
show.title: alternativevisions

title: Michael Albert
content:
Dr. Jack Rasmus will comment on the second presidential debate held on Tuesday and then introduce his guest for this week, Michael Albert.
Michael is the co-founder of ‘Z’ communications, a progressive print and media publisher, and a key organizer for the ‘International Organization of Participatory Society, IOPS.
His most recent work co-authored is the three volume book, ‘Fanfare for the Future’ published this summer.
  Michael and Jack will discuss alternative visions about how work can be organized on a more democratic basis and how that could prevent unnecessary hardship and economic crises such as are occurring worldwide today.
